item.title: Day 65 - My Haskell Genesis
item.description: Today I made my first Haskell Project ! It was a text-based hangman game, and it was heavily guided by the book, even-so it brought everything together and it was quite cool actually producing something tangible. So the basics for setting up any project is by the following commands: stack new my-project cd my-project stack setup stack build stack exec my-project-exe stack new builds a project directory for a new Haskell Project stack setup will download or update the necessary GHC compiler stack build will build the minimal project in order to execute teh project.
